    • Constructor Detail

      • PortalLocalBackedKVStore

        public PortalLocalBackedKVStore(Channel componentChannel,
                                String portalPrefix)

        Create a new key/value store that uses the browser’s local storage for persisting the values.

        Parameters:
        componentChannel - the channel that the component’s handlers listen on by default and that Manager.fire(Event, Channel...) sends the event to
        portalPrefix - the portal’s prefix as returned by Portal.prefix(), i.e. staring and ending with a slash
